text.*:
Colnect Collectors Club Community
Type of site
 Online collectible item catalogs and personal collection management
Available in 62 languages
Owner Colnect, private
Created by Amir Wald
Website http://colnect.com/
Registration free registration is optional
Launched 28th April, 2002
Current status Active

Colnect Collectors Club Community, is a website containing wiki-like collectables catalogs. It allows collectors to manage their personal collection using these catalogs and automatically match their swap/wish-lists with those of other collectors. Colnect provides a marketplace dedicated to buying and selling collectibles. Colnect's phone cards catalog is the biggest in the world.[1][2]

Contents

  • 1 History
  • 2 Features
  • 3 Statistics
  • 4 Rewards
  • 5 See also
  • 6 References
  • 7 External links

History[edit]

Colnect was founded in 2002 as Islands Phonecards Database with the aim to create a catalog of all phonecards. Since autumn 2008, stamps and coins are supported in addition to phone cards. In the mean time, 38[3] types of collectables are represented. Here is an overview of selected collectibles:

Collectable Added on Number of items Link to catalog

Stamps September 2008 750,893 Stamp catalog
Coins September 2008 120,022 Coin catalog
Banknotes May 2009 95,162 Banknote catalog
Bottle Caps May 2009 34,733 Bottle Cap catalog

Gift Cards June 2010 166,983 Gift Card catalog

Beer Coasters January 2011 62,001 Beer Coaster catalog
Tokens June 2012 12,349 Token catalog
Trading Card Games July 2012 71,962 Trading Card Game catalog
Sugar Packets July 2012 75,347 Sugar Packet catalog
LEGO Sets August 2012 7,512 LEGO Set catalog

Pocket Calendars October 2012 50,384 Pocket Calendar catalog
Video Games December 2012 6,646 Video Game catalog
Functional Cards January 2013[4] 30,095 Functional Card catalog
Drink Labels February 2013[5] 119,616 Drink Label catalog
Medals and Decorations March 2013[6] 24,315 Decoration catalog
Tea Labels April 2013 9,757 Tea Label catalog
Lottery Tickets May 2013[7] 23,014 Lottery Ticket catalog
Paper Clips January 2014[8] 69,685 Paper Clip catalog
Sports Cards February 2014[9] 57,694 Sports Card catalog
Milk Cup Lids March 2014[10] 35,765 Milk Cup Lid catalog
Kids' Meal Toys April 2014[11] 26,765 Kids' Meal Toy catalog
Holy Cards December 2015 9,809 Holy Card catalog
Admission Tickets February 2016 6,997 Admission Ticket catalog
Philatelic Products January 2017 48,172 Philatelic Product catalog
Bookmarks May 2017 4,904 Bookmark catalog
Cigarette Packs July 2017 11,770 Cigarette Pack catalog
Comics September 2017 10,170 Comic catalog
Aircraft Safety Cards January 2018 3,265 Aircraft Safety Card catalog
Paper Napkins February 2018 26,335 Paper Napkin catalog
Fruit Stickers March 2018 5,974 Fruit Sticker catalog

(Last Updated: 19 September 2018, the figures in the table above were rounded down)

Features[edit]

The collectables catalogs on Colnect are created by collectors using the site. New items are added by contributors and verified by volunteering editors. Though any collector may add their comments on a catalog item, actual changes are done only by site-trusted editors. All users can see the catalog information (issue dates, print runs, pictures, etc.). Registered users can additionally manage their personal collection by marking each item as belonging to their collection, swap list or wish list while browsing through the catalogs. These users automatically can match their swap list with a wish list of another user and vice versa.[12] Users can purchase a Premium membership with additional features. Contributors get it for free. Premium members can download any list with collectables and open it as a spreadsheet.

Colnect provides a marketplace for collectibles. It is publicly available since December 27, 2017. Sales on the marketplace are connected to the centralized catalogs. Sellers can post items for sale directly from the catalog and buyers can view information about a collectible on the item’s page.

Statistics[edit]

The site reports it caters for collectors from 113[13] countries. Hundreds of them are helping the site voluntarily, including the translators who translate Colnect into 62 languages.

As of 2018 Colnect lists 435 Chinese transportation tickets, which are issued by 147 different Chinese companies.[14]

Rewards[edit]

On April 25, 2009 Colnect was announced as the winner in the European Startup 2.0 competition, out of about 200 competing companies and 11 finalists.[15][16]

On December 31, 2009 Colnect was a close runner up on the TechAviv Peer Awards startup companies competition. It has lost to 5min by a single vote.[17][18]
